org.grapheditor.editor.vertexrenders
Interface SimpleDrawAble

All Known Implementing Classes:
CircleVertexRenderComponent, DefaultVertexRenderComponent, SquareVertexRenderComponent, TriangleVertexRenderComponent
public interface SimpleDrawAble

This interface is implemented by the vertex render components to show that they have a method to simple draw themself. This method is used by the EPS-file exporter due to the fact that the EPSGraphics class that is used by it does not work with the default draw operation becouse it does not support some drawing operations.

Author:
kjellw
